main_definition: Knives refer to sharp-edged tools used for cutting or as a metaphor in idiomatic expressions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A handheld tool with a sharp blade for cutting
meanings_and_examples.example: She carefully sliced the bread using her kitchen knife.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In idiomatic expressions, metaphorically representing conflict or tension
meanings_and_examples.example: There was a lot of animosity between them, like two knives in a drawer ready to cut each other.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as part of an expression referring to being prepared for confrontation or combat
meanings_and_examples.example: He always carries pepper spray and a self-defense knife, just in case he needs it.
